Description.Text: The Hotel has 219 rooms, in pleasantly low buildings of 2 and 4 floors. There are three types of rooms: double room, duplex and suites. All rooms have a pool view. They are so exceptionally well equipped that they will satisfy the most demanding guests: a comfortable sofa bed for a third person, telephone, safety deposit box, satellite-TV, music system, air conditioning, bathroom, and a balcony or terrace. The maximum capacity is 3 adults for the double rooms or 2 adults and 2 children, four adults for the duplex, and 5 adults for the suites. Our swimming pools will help you to forget the stresses of daily life. In their clear waters, surrounded by a beautiful garden and a wide solarium with deck chairs and parasols you will find the peace and relaxation you are looking for. Drago Park has 2 heated swimming pools, one for adults (800 sq. metres) and the other one, for children, close by at the mini club.

The Club Drago Park complex is just under a mile from Sotavento Beach, and its pleasant waterfront cafes. The hotel is 15 miles from the town and port of Morro Jable, from where the Las Palmas and Tenerife ferry and jetfoil leave. The town is a favourite for holidays in Fuerteventura as it has a European feel with a selection of restaurants, bars and shops and a long sandy beach.

In our spacious and comfortable buffet-like restaurant we serve breakfast and dinner. It can seat 450 guests and you can choose from a large variety of menus. We regularly organise culinary nights dedicated to a special country or part of the world, for example, Italy, Asia, Canary Islands, or Mexico.
